content.prompt: Which of the following investigations would enable researchers to test the claim that an increased concentration of algae has a negative effect on the number of aquatic invertebrates in the ecosystem?

choices.label: Examining the contents of the digestive tracts of aquatic invertebrates and looking for the presence of algae
Examining the growth rate of algae in the absence of aquatic invertebrates
Counting the number of aquatic invertebrates at different concentrations of chlorophyll a in the water
Counting the number of aquatic invertebrates at different concentrations of nitrogen and phosphorus in the water

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
